actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The veteran makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Tactical Movement
bonus_actions.desc: Until the end of the veterans turn, their Speed is halved and their movement doesnt provoke opportunity attacks.

reactions.name: Off-Hand Counter
reactions.desc: When the veteran is missed by a melee attack by an attacker they can see within 5 feet, the veteran makes a shortsword attack against the attacker.
